t: Amazon.com : Nando's Hot Peri-peri Sauce 250ml : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: Authentic nandos hot sauce. Perfect for chicken, fries, anything you like!! Good price and arrived in ok temperature. It was out for a while but still fine by the time we got it. ... Great taste and really spicy. ... It is too salty and it is not the same as the original. It lacks that zing, and the extra salt makes it so that you cannot add enough. The original was much better than this brand...
